org.lightningj.paywall.springboot2.paymenthandler

Class DemoPerRequestPaymentData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.springboot2.paymenthandler.DemoPerRequestPaymentData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MinimalPaymentData, PaymentData, PerRequestPaymentData

    @Entity
public class DemoPerRequestPaymentData
extends java.lang.Object
implements PerRequestPaymentData
    Demo payment data implementing the PerRequestPaymentData requirements for payment flow to work. It is a simple JPA Entity with following columns:
    • id: primary id in database
    • preImageHash: unique preImageHash generated with the order.
    • orderAmount: the orderAmount in satoshis for this payment
    • payPerRequest: If payment flow is for one request only..
    • executed: If related request already have been executed.

        public byte[] getPreImageHash()
        Unique identifier of a payment in the system and also used in LightningHandler to identify an invoice. Should be generated by TokenGenerator when creating an order and not set manually.

      • getOrderAmount

        public Amount getOrderAmount()
        Specified by:
        getOrderAmount in interface MinimalPaymentData
        Returns:
        the requested amount for payment. This can be either a FiatAmount or CryptoAmount but always make sure the systems configured CurrencyConverter supports this currency when converting into a currency accepted by the LightningHandler later in the payment flow.

      • isPayPerRequest

        public boolean isPayPerRequest()
        Specified by:
        isPayPerRequest in interface PerRequestPaymentData
        Returns:
        flag indicating that this payment is for one request only. The implementation can take the payPerRequest flag from the order request as guidance, but it is the PaymentHandler that ultimately decides if payPerRequest should be set.

      • setPayPerRequest

        public void setPayPerRequest(boolean payPerRequest)
        Specified by:
        setPayPerRequest in interface PerRequestPaymentData
        Parameters:
        payPerRequest - flag indicating that this payment is for one request only. The implementation can take the payPerRequest flag from the order request as guidance, but it is the PaymentHandler that ultimately decides if payPerRequest should be set.

      • isExecuted

        public boolean isExecuted()
        Specified by:
        isExecuted in interface PerRequestPaymentData
        Returns:
        true if related request have been executed, is set after successful processing if a payed call and used to indicate that it cannot be processed again.
